rows.label: qst200707_msg0003
rows.name:
Ah, Tora get it. For sure, this area full
of monsters, so if friend have no Blade
to help, get feathers is challenge.

rows.label: qst200707_msg0004
rows.name:
N-not at all! No challenge!
I already have a brilliant stratagem!

rows.label: qst200707_msg0005
rows.name:
You may play with the monsters
if you wish!

rows.label: qst200707_msg0007
rows.name:
Huh... Idaten, with how fast you are,
I bet you could fetch the feather
without the monsters noticing you.

rows.label: qst200707_msg0012
rows.name: I'll be there and back in no time!

rows.label: qst200707_msg0013
rows.name:
N-no way!
At this speed, I'll be found for sure!

rows.label: qst200707_msg0014
rows.name:
Nah, I'd feel bad sending Idaten alone.
Let's all go ahead together!

rows.label: qst200707_msg0015
rows.name:
Right, let's wade through monsters
again... Joy of joys.
